unnormalised: **The Great Indian Bargain: Ek Comedy Rupiya ani Paisant**
normalised: **The Great Indian Bargain: A Comedy in Rupees and Paisa**

unnormalised: Ailem mhunn sangtat, lokanno. Bhartant shopping mhunnlear fakt ek vevhar nhoi; tem ek Olympic khell. Usain Bolt-achi kalpona kara, punn sprinting korchea bodlek, to ek kilo kandyachea molacher ghasghasi kortat. To tumcho sadharan Bhartiyo shopper! Ghasghasichi khushi, ₹50 kami korpachi jikh ₹50 temi "fixed price" tag-acher amkam khub favo zata. Mhoje aji, tanchem cotton saree bhale kortha, tanchem lagin vishvachi shanti kortat ani ek price tag tanchem hatant dilear.
normalised: Let's face it, folks. Bhartant shopping munjavnn divpa sarkhem nhoi; tem ek Olympic sport. U-S-A-I-N Bolt imagin korat, punn sprinting korche bodlek, to eka kilo piyazanchea molacher haggle korta. To tumcho average Indian shopper! Aami bargainchea thrillacher jivitat, “fixed price” tagacherthun rupee fifty kamathi gheuchea godd vijecher. Mhajim aaji, tiche cotton saree-k ashirvad, tinnim world peace negotiate korunk xakta, zaka zodd korunk price tag dilear.

unnormalised: Sadharanponnacher natak koxem cholta: Tumkam ek sundar kurta ₹800-k dista. "Bahut mehenga hai!" (Khub mogyachem!), tum ulo maratat, tumkam lipun aslear ti chori mhunn dista. Dukandar, ek anubhavi pro, dukhkho disaita. "Madam, ye toh sasta hai! Pure cotton!" (Madam, hem sasteak asa! Pure cotton!). Nach suru zata. Tum ₹500 diunk sodtat. To hoxeta, dukhkhi zaleacho natak korta. "Arey bhai bhai bhai, ₹750, final!" To mhunta, tumancher upkar kortat mhunn.
normalised: The drama samanean oxem zata: Tumi ek boro kurta rupee atth xem-k dekhthat. "Bahut mehenga hai!" (Khoop costly!), tum uloukat, tumi soglem choruponnan chintlet zalearui ki to steal asa. Dukanacho monis, ek seasoned pro, offense gheunk lagta. "Madam, ye toh sasta hai! Pure cotton!" (Madam, hem saste asa! Pure cotton!). Nach suru zata. Tumi rupee panch xem-in counter kortat. To hastat, tor dramantically tacho chesto dhorun. "Arey bhai bhai bhai, rupee saat xem ani ponnas, final!" To sangta, toxem dakoita ki to *tumcher* favor korta.

unnormalised: Ani auto-rickshaw bhadyancher mhaka suruvat korunk divnakat. Tum vichartat, “Bhaiyya, Andheri station-ak kitle?” To ₹200 mhunta. Tumkam mahit asa ti ₹120-chi ride asa. Tum dukhi zatat, ₹100 divnk sodtat. To tache hat voir uddaita, CNG-chem vaddtem mol ani tachea bhurgeanchea shaleychea fees-amchi dukhkhi kortat. Hem tum duren vochpak asta (khup moti takat) vo ₹150-k thoaraitat ek natki ghasghasichim lagin Bollywood courtroom scene-ak barobarit korunk xakta.
normalised: Ani auto-rickshaw fare-nchyo xuruatui mhaka korunk dinakat. Tumi vicharat, “Bhaiyya, Andheri station-ak kitlem zata?” To rupee don xem kotta. Tuka khobor asa ki to rupee ek xem ani vis ride asa, tops. Tumi grimace kortat, rupee ek xem offer kortat. To tacho hath havaient uchalta, C-N-G-nchi voddlil moll ani tachea bhurgeanche xallechea fees-ancher dukhest zata. Hem te vatten tumi eksarke vatten cholta (ultimate power move) vo rupee ek xem ani ponnas-in theatrical negotiation-an settle zatat, zaka Bollywood courtroom scene-ichi rivall korta.

unnormalised: Online shopping-akui rokhnas mhunn asa. Ami deals-ank hawks koxem rokhtat, tanchea magical "Sale!" banner yetat mhunn zann zalear. Cashback offers, promo codes, bank discounts – hem ek gunthagunthit vasnu zavn asa. Ani thoim ek return policy asa. Konnainch online-an porot dhaddun dilem nam? "Didn't fit," "colour was different," "my cat didn't like it" - karannam khub ani hoxetale asatat! E-commerce-ak dhanyavad, ami azunui ₹75 te ₹100 chodd vastuancher bachovpak zata.
normalised: Online shoppingui immune na. Aami hawks sarkea deals-cher stalk kortat, tem magical "Sale!" banner yeunchea vatten wait kortat. Cashback offers, promo codes, bank discounts – tem savings-anchem ek complex web asa. Ani magir asa return policy. Konnain online kosliench retourn na kelean? "Fit zale mhunn na," "colour dusro aslo," "mhajea pujek tem favon aslem na" - hem excuses endless ani hilarious asa! E-commerce-k thanks, aami samanean rupee sattar ani ponnas rupee ek xem save korunk chuktana.

unnormalised: Techak lagun, dusrea velar tumi Bhartant astana ani tumi eka ghasghasichea madhyomant aslear, tem yaad dovrat: tem fakt poixeanchi vostu nhoi. Ti performance, ti kotha sangpachi vostu, ti pure khushi chase-achi. Ani, nischit rupan, to tumkam brag korpak mellta tumi jevnnak ₹499-k dil'le vellar. Happy Shopping, ani ghasghasiche dev tumche vatten asunk zai!
normalised: Tech khatir, tumi zatkan Bharotan asat ani tumkam spirited price negotiation-anchea modhean tumkam mellta, hem ugddas dhorat: hem fakt poixeanchem nhoi. Tem performance-achem asa, storytelling-achem, chase-anchem sheer joy-achem asa. Ani, khoob nischit, bragging rights tumkam mellta tednam tumi zatkan rupee char xem ani navvad ani navi-k amazing deal score kortat. Happy Shopping, ani bargaining dev tumchea favouran astole!
